**Set Up Zotero**


<details class="collapsible">
<summary>Download and Install Zotero (Recommended before the workshop)</summary>

- Go to [Zotero.org/download](https://www.zotero.org/download/)
- Download Zotero Desktop (Windows, macOS, or Linux).
- Install the software on your computer [Video Instructions](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JG7Uq_JFDzE).

</details>


<details class="collapsible">
<summary>Install the Zotero Connector (Recommended before the workshop)</summary>


- [Download the Zotero Connector](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/zotero-connector/ekhagklcjbdpajgpjgmbionohlpdbjgc) for your browser (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, or Safari).

*This lets you save references directly from websites, databases, and Google Scholar.*

</details>



<details class="collapsible">
<summary>Create a Zotero Account (Recommended before the workshop)</summary>


- Go to [Zotero.org](https://www.zotero.org/user/register/)
- Sign up for a free account (needed for syncing your library across devices).

</details>



<details class="collapsible">
<summary> Sync Your Library (Recommended before the workshop)</summary>

- Open the Zotero desktop app.
- Go to Edit â†’ Preferences â†’ Sync.
- Enter your Zotero account details and enable syncing.

</details>
